Text: Thanks for the upload, and keeping the XviD going.

Classification: Scripted
Genre: Comedy | Drama
Status: Returning Series
Network: TNT ( USA)

Franklin & Bash follows Jared Franklin (Breckin Meyer) and Peter Bash (Mark-Paul Gosselaar), lawyers who chase down their clients. They will stop at nothing to get a new client right after a car accident, arrest for solicitation or any other incident. Just as long as they can get a break. Often called "Ambulance Chasers" Jared and Peter explode in the courtroom with their flair and dramatics. Despite all the flair and pizaz, they are really good lawyers that know their job.
(http://www.tvrage.com/Franklin_And_Bash)
